segment.source: Installing the UE-V Group Policy ADMX Templates
segment.target: Installing the UE-V Group Policy ADMX Templates

segment.source: Installing the UE-V Group Policy ADMX Templates
segment.target: Installing the UE-V Group Policy ADMX Templates

segment.source: Installing the UE-V Group Policy ADMX Templates
segment.target: Installing the UE-V Group Policy ADMX Templates

segment.source: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) agent can be managed by using the existing Group Policy infrastructure.
segment.target: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) agent can be managed by using the existing Group Policy infrastructure.

segment.source: The UE-V ADMX template configures the synchronization settings for the UE-V agent.
segment.target: The UE-V ADMX template configures the synchronization settings for the UE-V agent.

segment.source: The ADMX template enables the central management of common UE-V Agent configuration settings by using an existing Group Policy infrastructure.
segment.target: The ADMX template enables the central management of common UE-V Agent configuration settings by using an existing Group Policy infrastructure.

segment.source: Supported operating systems for the Domain Controller that deploys the Group Policy Objects include the following:
segment.target: Supported operating systems for the Domain Controller that deploys the Group Policy Objects include the following:

segment.source: ADMX files can be installed and tested locally on any computer that runs the Windows operating system.
segment.target: ADMX files can be installed and tested locally on any computer that runs the Windows operating system.

segment.source: To download the UE-V ADMX templates
segment.target: To download the UE-V ADMX templates

segment.source: Download the UE-V ADMX template files: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=393941.
segment.target: Download the UE-V ADMX template files: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=393941.

segment.source: For more information about how to deploy the Group Policy templates, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=393944.
segment.target: For more information about how to deploy the Group Policy templates, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=393944.

segment.source: Configuring UE-V with Group Policy Objects
segment.target: Configuring UE-V with Group Policy Objects
